thread.title: Amelia Gilbert

author: Amelia Gilbert
title: Amelia Gilbert
text: I started wearing Fabletics workout clothes a few years ago. I was working as a personal trainer and in the best shape of my life and the Fabletics Solar leggings carried me through. Then my husband and I decided it was time to expand our little family. I ordered larger leggings, and Fabletics supported my growing belly through my whole pregnant fitness journey. Now I'm 5 months post pregnant and I'm now ordering new Lisette high-waisted 7/8 capri leggings to support my once again changing body. These clothes are versatile, comfortable, high end material, super affordable, and long lasting. They offer support where its needed. Love LOVE love this brand.
